articles.author: Meg  Oliver
articles.title: Older Americans turning to AI-powered chatbots for companionship - CBS News
articles.description: Jill Smola, a 75-year-old widow, says she spends up to five hours a day talking to a chatbot companion.
articles.content:
Jill Smola is a 75-year-old retiree who understands the power of human connection, having spent her working days as an aide taking care of the elderly.
"We would play games, put puzzles together," S… [+1912 chars]
